sorcer.core
Interface Monitorable

All Known Subinterfaces:
MonitoringManagement, MonitorManagement, MonitorSessionManagement, Provider, SorcerNotifierProtocol
All Known Implementing Classes:
DatabaseProvider, DataSpaceProvider, ExertMonitor, RemoteLoggerManager, ServiceCataloger, ServiceJobber, ServiceProvider, ServiceSpacer, ServiceTasker
public interface Monitorable

All providers that need to be monitored implement this interface. If a provider is a monitorable, then the provider has to have the capability to keep track of the providerExertionID's and the task corresponding to it. It has to also provide functionality to stop, suspend any running exertion or resume/step any suspended or finished tasks. All states of the executing exertions are maintained by the MonitorManager.

Method Summary
 void resume(Exertion ex)
          Resume if the resume functionality is supported by the monitorables.
 void step(Exertion ex)
          Step if the step functionality is supported by the monitorables.
 void stop(UEID ref, Subject subject)
          MonitorManagers call stop on a MonitorableServicer.
 void suspend(UEID ref, Subject subject)
          MonitorManagers call suspend a MonitorableServicer.
 

Method Detail

stop

void stop(UEID ref,
          Subject subject)
          throws RemoteException,
                 UnknownExertionException,
                 AccessDeniedException
MonitorManagers call stop on a MonitorableServicer. Once stop is called, the monitorables must return the dataContext and then initiate the cleanup.

Throws:
UnknownExertionException - if the exertion is not executed by this provider.
RemoteException - if there is a communication error
AccessDeniedException

suspend

void suspend(UEID ref,
             Subject subject)
             throws RemoteException,
                    UnknownExertionException,
                    AccessDeniedException
MonitorManagers call suspend a MonitorableServicer. Once suspend is called, the monitorables must suspend immediatly and return the suspended state of the dataContext.

Throws:
UnknownExertionException - if the exertion is not executed by this provider.
RemoteException - if there is a communication error
AccessDeniedException

resume

void resume(Exertion ex)
            throws RemoteException,
                   ExertionException
Resume if the resume functionality is supported by the monitorables. Else start from the begining.

Throws:
UnknownExertionException - if the exertion is not executed by this provider.
RemoteException - if there is a communication error
ExertionException

step

void step(Exertion ex)
          throws RemoteException,
                 ExertionException
Step if the step functionality is supported by the monitorables. Else start from the begining.

Throws:
UnknownExertionException - if the exertion is not executed by this provider.
RemoteException - if there is a communication error
ExertionException
